item.description:
More Info NEW! Spiritual High Tea

My Assistant, Lisa and I are hosting a Summer Spiritual High Tea. We will enjoy a lovely organic Formal Summer High Tea in fine china vintage and antique tea cups. A meditation and open spiritual discussion with Vanessa is included. Let's gather for a spiritual celebration of summer and self! Sundresses and hats are optional but would be fun!
Reservations and $15 deposit are required. No charge cards accepted.

Sunday, July 10, 2011
3 - 5 PM
$25 per person

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: English High Tea " With a Touch by an Angel"
